description: This is a short hike of about 300m to some lesser known and smaller falls on Horseshoe Turn Brook.  I would only go there on my way to larger falls close by such as Vameys or Wallace Brook (both on trailpeak too!)
directions: In Malignant cove, turn east on highway 337.  The brook runs under highway at; N45.84196° W62.00001°. Park and follow it downstream.
title: Horseshoe Turn Brook Fall
